what: Generates Random Samples from Probability Distributions
title: Generates Random Samples from Probability Distributions
text: Functions allow generating random samples Pareto distribution Burr XII distribution. method used generate values implemented using Inverse Transform Sampling method.

title: Generates Random Samples from Probability Distributions
text: can install development version genrs GitHub :

title: Generates Random Samples from Probability Distributions
text: basic examples using functions available genrs package: Function rburrxii generates random data following Burr XII distribution parameters shape1 shape2. Function rparetoi generates random data following Pareto distribution parameters scale shape.

what: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
title: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
text: function designed generate random data following Burr XII distribution parameters shape1 shape2.

title: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
text: n number observations. shape1, shape2 shape parameters. Must strictly positive.

title: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
text: vector containing data distributed according Burr XII distribution sample size specified n, shape parameters specified shape1 shape2.

title: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii
text: Burr XII distribution parameters shape1 = \(\gamma\) shape2 = \(\alpha\) probability density function: $$f_{X}(x) = \alpha\gamma\dfrac{x^{\alpha-1}}{(1+x^\alpha)^{\gamma+1}}$$ \(x>0\), \(\gamma>0\) \(\alpha>0\).

title: Generates a random sample from a Burr XII distribution — rburrxii

what: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
title: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
text: function designed generate random data following Pareto distribution parameters scale shape.

title: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
text: n number observations. scale scale parameter. Must strictly positive. shape shape parameter. Must strictly positive.

title: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
text: vector containing data distributed according Pareto distribution sample size specified n, scale shape parameters specified scale shape, respectively.

title: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
text: Pareto distribution parameters scale = \(\theta\) shape = \(\alpha\) probability density function: $$f_{X}(x) = \dfrac{\alpha\theta^{\alpha}}{x^{\alpha+1}}$$ \(x\geq \theta\), \(\theta>0\) \(\alpha>0\).

title: Generates a random sample from a Pareto I distribution — rparetoi
